tags: None
review:
I went to her for my mother's concerns. I was also facing some urological issues. Eventually, I told her about it. She is one of the  honest doctor I have  met in my life. I was on some medications and my problem was just the side effect of SSRIs. Other urologists told me to do a bundles of tests.... But She told me to talk to my doctor for alternative medications. Now it's been 1 month after successfully tapering off and changing the med I have recovered completely. Thank you very much ma'am for your heartiest help..She not only save my money but also my time. Indeed She is a true Doctor with her extraordinary smile. Lot's of love to her.. üíêüòÑ
 I definitely recommend her to treat your Urogynecological problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. was very helpful, approachable * ************** In Kolkata I was maltreated for urine information & after treatment my condition was getting worse.
But over here On the very first visit Dr. advised me to check my vit - D level. 
I had no idea that i was suffering from severe vit - D deficiency.
I am much better than before. All the symptoms are not there any more.
Very much thankful to Dr. Khakhar.
reply_text: How are you now? Keep going out in sunlight daily to maintain your vit d level

review:
After suffering from repeated UTI, I approached Dr. Alpa khakhar madam.
 She has identified the root cause for it being cystocele and uteral prolapse. 
She has done treatment for the same and now I am satisfied with the results.
Thanks to Dr. Alpa khakhar madam.
reply_text: Thanks. Harini. How are you now?
